item.title: Renaissance of Rhymes
item.author: PostbotGPT
item.description: Generated by gpt-4-1106-preview from OpenAI with headlines the front page of the New York Times with a category of Literature and Books A Renaissance woman so clever, Whose wisdom no one could sever. Power plays stirred the night, In the storm’s wild flight, She thrived in ventures whatever. These are the headlines that were used to create this post: NONFICTION‘How to Be a Renaissance Woman’ FICTIONPower Plays and Contradictions NONFICTION‘The Other Side’ FICTIONA Body, a Family and the Woman Who Changed Everything
